item.title: Helm 2 to 3 Migration Review
item.description: My first project at Calm was migrating Helm2 to Helm3. In this post, I’m going to share a few resources I used as guidance and more detailed steps and minor problems I ran into during the migration process. Recommended Read Summary of the changes from Helm 2 to Helm 3 How to migrate from Helm v2 to Helm v3 Migrating to Helm 3: What You Need to Know Migration Scenario at Calm At Calm, we have multiple k8s clusters throughout the environment.
